property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your other Aliens from the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, put one of your Aliens that costs less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

card.name: Joan of Arc, Goddess of Ruin

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your light Hunter creatures in the battle zone, your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Super Infinite evolution—Put on one or more of your creatures that has each civilization: Light, Water, and Fire. ■ Whenever this creature would break one of your opponent's shields, your opponent reveals the shield instead. From among it, cast all revealed spells for no cost, then put them into their owner's graveyard. Then, this creature breaks that shield. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or another creature into the battle zone, draw a card, then put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, shuffle all cards in your graveyard face down and put them on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent reveals that shield instead. You may put a non-evolution creature from your hand that costs less than any of the revealed cards from that shield into the battle zone. Then break that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put a multicolored creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. If they all have the same cost, you may reveal them and put them into your hand. If they don't all have the same cost, put them on top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creature in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 for each civilization on your cards in the battle zone until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Hunters in the battle zone gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. ■ If you have 7 or more Hunters in the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Hunters in the battle zone gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn. ■ If you have 7 or more Hunters in the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of your turn, if you have 4 'Keroyon Quartet' in the battle zone, you win the game. ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Hunter creatures. {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses a card in their mana zone and puts it into their graveyard. Then you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules

Then you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SPACE CHARGE}: Multicolored (Whenever you put a Multicolored card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone. Destroy it, return it to its owner's hand or add it to its owner's shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Super Infinite evolution—Put on one or more of your creatures that has each civilization: Light, Darkness, and Fire. ■ At the start of each player's turns, that player chooses one of their non-multicolored creatures and destroys it. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

card.name: Deis Al Maaz, Guardian of Flight

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPACE CHARGE}: Multicolored (Whenever you put a Multicolored card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Each of your cards in the battle zone and your mana zone are considered to be cards of all civilizations until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPACE CHARGE}: Multicolored (Whenever you put a Multicolored card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it. {POWER ATTACKER} +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) ■ When this creature would break a shield, if your opponent has no cards in their hand, put it into your opponent's graveyard instead. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPACE CHARGE}: Multicolored (Whenever you put a Multicolored card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Put a non-evolution creature that costs 5 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. That creature gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. At the end of the turn, put that creature on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ If you have 5 or more water cards in your mana zone, draw 2 cards. ■ If you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand. ■ If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, choose and destroy up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ If you have 5 or more water cards in your mana zone, draw 2 cards. ■ If you have 5 or more darkness cards in your mana zone, your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand. ■ If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, choose and destroy up to 2 of your opponent's creatures that have power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put a multicolored creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of your opponent's psychic creatures that have total power 8000 or less and destroy them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each of your civilizations in the battle zone. ■ While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "double breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's psychic creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hyperspatial zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's psychic creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hyperspatial zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both:: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a multicolored psychic creature that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.) {SAVER}: Psychic Creature (When one of your Psychic Creature(s) would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both:: ► One of your creatures breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn: ► Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both: ► Draw up to 2 cards, then discard a card: ► Your opponent draws a card, then chooses 2 cards in their hand and discards them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SPACE CHARGE}: Multicolored (Whenever you put a Multicolored card into your mana zone, you may use this creature's Space Charge ability.) Put a multicolored Alien psychic creature that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, or when this creature is destroyed, choose a card in your opponent's hand at random, and your opponent reveals that card. Put a Hunter psychic creature that has the same civilization as the revealed card that costs 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, or when this creature is destroyed, choose a card in your opponent's hand at random, and your opponent reveals that card. Put a Hunter psychic creature that has the same civilization as the revealed card that costs 8 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both:: ► Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have a multicolored creature in the battle zone, you may choose both:: ► Shuffle all cards in your graveyard other than this card. Choose a card at random and put it into your hand. Then return the remaining cards into your graveyard face-up: ► Search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

Rules

property.name: Rules

(At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

If you do, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of multicolored creatures from the revealed cards into the battle zone for no cost and cast any number of multicolored spells for no cost. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. {TRIPLE BREAKER}
